newsitem.title: FINLAND: Winning lottery is danger for mental health - expert.
newsitem.headline: Winning lottery is danger for mental health - expert.

text.p: Winning the lottery can be bad for your sanity, the Finnish Association for Mental Health said on Tuesday.
"Winning is a crisis situation," said Pirkko Lahti, the association's executive director. "You have to reappraise your entire life."
The Finnish state lottery last weekend paid out a $4.2 million prize, its biggest ever for one individual, prompting the association to call for payouts to be limited.

Lottery winners often find themselves surrounded by people looking for a handout, Lahti said: "It's a very embarrassing ethical problem. All of a sudden you're faced with the whole spectrum of misery."
